name: SPACE JAM GAME
description:
How long can you survive in the darkness of space?

Maneuver your ultra high-tech spaceship to collect suns and increase your visibility range, while at the same time trying to avoid asteroids and space mines (that's right...SPACE MINES!).

Blow stuff up to earn points! Rescue stranded aliens to earn even more awesome points!!!

Who put these mines in space? How is it possible to "collect" a sun? Why are there randomly floating aliens; and are they friendly? These, and other equally valid questions, will not be answered in this game!

Thanks for playing!

HOW TO PLAY (Controller Recommended)

*** Xbox Controller ***

  • Movement: Left Stick
  • Shoot Right: B Button
  • Shoot Left: X Button
  • Shoot Down: A Button
  • Shoot Up: Y Button
  • Bomb: Right Bumper Button

*** Keyboard ***

  • Movement: UP, RIGHT, DOWN, LEFT, WASD
  • Shoot Right: 3 (number pad)
  • Shoot Left: 1 (number pad)
  • Shoot Down: 2 (number pad)
  • Shoot Up: 5 (number pad)
  • Bomb: Spacebar

By: Michael Milson

For: GameMaker Studio 2 BetaJam #2
